channel.title: 508 help
channel.description: How do i change what NPCS say? And shops titles?? BTW its a 508 server

item.title: 508 help
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Kaii Mod Kaii
item.description:
@Mod_Kaii wrote:

Go to Bulby > IO > Packets and there should be files saying: NPC Option 1, 2 & 3. If you right click > edit and press CTRL + F, search for the NPC name (exact) or the message which should take you straight to what that NPC says, and there you edit. Or just work your way through the files… Once you’ve done that, switch off your server and compile, wait… and put it back on, log on and check if it’s changed.

Only change the text, don’t delete any of the “” or the other stuff. I think you can also change the NPC name.

Read full topic
